Reviews.Title: I like this Kit
Reviews.Author: J.T.
Reviews.Content: I am new at DSLR, so instead of buying a single D3100, I need to buy a kit, There are two reasons let me choose this kit: First. most of the items in this kit is useful for me, what I really need in this kit is the camera,the memory card and the bag, but after I received this kit, I found that the UV filter and the LCD screen protecter are also useful, they are good choice to protect LCD screen and Lens, and also if you don't have a card reader slot on your computer, you will also need the card reader in this kit. The second reason is the price, it is much cheaper to buy a kit than to buy these items seperatly, I compared this seller's kit with other's seller's kit also, this price is good, accturely, when I bought it, the price is around 680 dollars, it's cut now, but it is also a good price at the time when I bought it. Finally, the product is as good as discribed, and shipping service is good and fast, I got what I want.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: It is a good camera...my first DSLR
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: It came earlier than promised!!! Good job!I am a novice when it comes to photography, but have had quite a few cameras already. I used to own the Nikon N70 and was quite happy with its performance, but then came the convenience of the POINT-AND-SHOOT. I never really like these compact ones, but my wife nagged me all the time about always wanting small and easy to use cameras. So, I gave in for the last three little ones. This time, I stood my ground and purchased this D3100 since both of my kids are in sports activities such as soccer and karate etc... The point-and-shoot couldn't do squat, but this D3100 seems to be doing the job. I am still in the play-around-with-it mode, but have shot quite a few nice action pictures. Since it is winter here in the Northeast and the sports are being played indoor now, lighting is a limitting factor and so the pics are not as great as they could be--I hope. The shutter speed is not the best, but at 3/sec is adequate for most of the situations that people commonly encounter.The included lense is fairly good and the VR feature works great. Auto-focus is relatively quick, but a bit high on the noise---this gets recorded if you do Video-recording! I recommend using manual focus during filming. I am looking for a more powerful zoom lense as I am sure the 18-55mm is not adequate out on the soccer fields....overall, I am fairly happy with its performance!

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Corey Hayes
Reviews.Content: Awesome package with all items included. I also got an extra battery, which I highly recommend if you buy this item. Overall, this has been an excellent purchase and an excellent product, I have no complaints whatsoever, if you need a camera and you can afford this product, Buy It! You will not regret it!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Product was in great condition. I love the camera. Only complaint is that the screen protectors are low quality. This was still a great deal though!

Reviews.Title: Worth the buy
Reviews.Author: Stric07
Reviews.Content: Definitely worth the buy!! Came almost a week before it was supposed to arrive and all accessories were there and work great!  Greater camera for the advanced shooter with the photographic eye. ;)

Reviews.Title: Graet Starter Kit
Reviews.Author: Suprado
Reviews.Content: this is a Excelent kit for beginners!! good option from Nikon!! dont hesitate to buy this Kit! you will not regret! Cameta camera is a great dealer to buy with!!  go ahead and buy without thinking twice!!! =)

Reviews.Title: Best Camera EVER
Reviews.Author: ShannonMarie314
Reviews.Content: I bought myself this camera for my birthday and I have never spent my money better. It came in a timely fashion and I haven't put it down since. Anyone who wants a camera should get this one from this company. The package deal was so worth it, you get so much for your money.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I have recently bought Nikon D3100 + Kit: I'm really enjoying the product and the pictures, I'm very new to SLR and this product is user friendly. I would rate this product 5 out 5.

Reviews.Title: top of the line
Reviews.Author: Steven Allison "Steve"
Reviews.Content: I am a newspaper photographer so I take a few hundred shots with the camera every day. The file size is great for newspaper reproduction even allowing a good amount extra for image editing and the low scan filter gives good quality across the entire exposure range.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Leon Tondowski
Reviews.Content: The camera was a gift for my 17 year old daughter, interested in a good quality camera and at the same time a product that could expand the possibilities of taking a different kind of pictures. She learned quite easily and is very happy with the results. So am I.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic entry level dslr
Reviews.Author: Nikonian
Reviews.Content: Got one for my parents 25th anniversary and it's almost better than my d200 in almost every way ( except for burst speed and weather sealing). It takes very good low light shots especially with the be lens. Everything that comes with the kit is quality. My only gripe with the camera is the LCD acreen could be sharper considering it's. 14 megapixel sensor, something the d5100 has.

Reviews.Title: I am LOVING my camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am still a novice with a dslr but I am learning. It takes amazing photos with the standard lens although I would like to get a telephoto someday.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nicky
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera, takes wonderful pictures, easy transfers. Overall wonderful device. Also shipped extremely fast. So flexible, I can do anything I want with this device.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3100 Kit With 15-55 mm VR DX Lens
Reviews.Author: Prashant
Reviews.Content: The Product packing was very good . The delivery time was as committed while placing the Order.Nikon D3100 is an execellent product from Nikon and one of the most recent cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Entry level camera
Reviews.Author: MamaCat
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera to graduate to from a point and shoot.  IT is easy enough to jump right in and start using and see a difference in your pics, but complex enought that I foresee years of learning.  Haven't been bored or disappointed for a moment.

Reviews.Title: Great camera but package was more than I needed
Reviews.Author: Richard Salchow
Reviews.Content: I love the camera and it has been very easy to use like to reviews stated. My only complaint would be that the package deal didn't clearly state that it came with a battery and charger. So I went ahead and bought a battery and charger seperately. Also the camera case was bigger than I thought it would be, so I will probably end up buying a smaller case. Everything else that came in the package has been helpful so far, and in the end my wife and I both love the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Package Deal
Reviews.Author: PhotoFun
Reviews.Content: This package deal is great. The package came on time and in great, perfect, working condition. The card reader that I received was different than itemized but is actually better. I highly recommend purchasing this deal. I ended up buying a book to go with it so that I could learn more about my Nikon. The camera bag is also a very durable and nice bag.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product sold by great shop with an unbeatable price
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The title says it all. I am very satisfied in every way with my purchase. Thanks amazon and cameta camera! Great job!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and package deal
Reviews.Author: Bill Brown
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera after using my Minolta and Yashica SLRs for many years. I first tried to buy one online from Wal Mart since shipping to Alaska is so expensive. Not only could it not be done but the price of this package deal beats the heck out of the simple camera/tripod package Wal Mart was selling for $10 more! The package arrived quickly, was packed very well and everything was as described. The difference was the card reader was not the same pictured. But who cares? It works and is even more compact and I like it better for that reason.As to using it - if you are new to cameras that aren't point/click/shoot do not be afraid to buy one of these. The instructions are quite clear, simple and the illustrated guide would probably be sufficient for most buyers. You cannot go wrong with Nikon or with Cameta Camera.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected!
Reviews.Author: vanhoose
Reviews.Content: I was so worried that the camera would just come by itself and not in the original box. Boy was I glad when it came with everything you get when you purchase it from the store! I bought the camera last Thursday from the local Walmart. Before taxes it was $479 after taxes I paid $507. And all that you get is the camera etc. I looked online and found this package where you get the camera bag, memory card, card reader, etc all for $20 less than I paid just for the camera!! I am SO pleased with what I got!

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3100
Reviews.Author: Timbo
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the money.  Easy to use, and takes great pictures in auto mode.  Kit with case was better than I expected.  I did have to buy card reader to put photos on my I pad.

Reviews.Title: Love Nikon Camera
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: I love traveling nationwide in the US and love taking photos in different cities and towns. I want good quality photos and I was recommended by others for the beginner of photography. I decided to buy this Nikon D3100 SLR Camera and I love it.

Reviews.Title: GREATT!
Reviews.Author: Rawand Natsheh
Reviews.Content: Great deal and camera! Really happy with the package even though i never used most of the stuff that came with this package deal.

Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: Bernadette Goudelock
Reviews.Content: This package comes with everything shown and then some. I liked that the accesories were name brand and as avertised.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: TiffyJo
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Takes wonderful photos of my kids and anything else from my plants, food I baked and landscaping (for blogging photos). I love the whole package, especially the gadget that I can put the memory card into then put in my flash drive on my computer, makes for easy transfer of photos onto my computer. I love this and would recommend it to anyone wanting a great camera for a really good deal.

Reviews.Title: great package
Reviews.Author: doug
Reviews.Content: really great deal and excellent package....nikon quality is really excellent would recommend this...this gave us all our really great wedding pics

Reviews.Title: Everything.
Reviews.Author: J.P. Linde "J.P."
Reviews.Content: Everything I needed in one quick purchase!  All you need to supply is the desire to play. A Great experience!

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!
Reviews.Author: jennie Morey
Reviews.Content: A gift for my son and he hasn't put it down. He has taken excellent pictures, provides a wide variety of options that are very clear. You must remain very still though.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Kim
Reviews.Content: I love this set of camera very much. My best camera in my life. Good price and good pictures. Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Great camera !!
Reviews.Author: Adrian Garcia
Reviews.Content: I like it very mucho it has great features for a persons that is new at photography, great choice for starters

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: LaToya Deese
Reviews.Content: This is my first Digital SLR camera, and I love it!  The picture quality is AMAZING!  I'm still learning some stuff about the camera.  It's so easy to use - just right for those new to photography.  And the fact that the camera came with a lens kit (including screen protectors, memory card, memory card reader, camera bag, and more) is a major plus!  I would recommend this to anyone - all in one for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Good starting camera!
Reviews.Author: daniel solce
Reviews.Content: Everything works as it as intended.  I don't use it for video and don't see myself doing so anytime in the near future and therefore wasn't bothered by the lack of features dealing with the video functions of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a beginner like myself
Reviews.Author: Maraval, Trinidad W I
Reviews.Content: As a beginner to the DSLR camera, i'm very much impress especially with the info in the camera. It's great compare to the point&shoot.;

Reviews.Title: Nice combo kit for entry level DSLR
Reviews.Author: Sandeep Kumar
Reviews.Content: - Items are exactly as described- Recommended for new photographers- Value for money- Has everything you need to go start clicking

Reviews.Title: Very nice package deal
Reviews.Author: Joseph R. Bauman
Reviews.Content: This was a great package. It's my first DSLR, so I would have needed a case, memory card, etc. anyway. It was nice to see that everything came in one package. The camera itself is exactly what I was looking for, and I'm happy with everything so far.

Reviews.Title: Package deal
Reviews.Author: ronald
Reviews.Content: The camera is wonderful and its just amazing. But a better lens should be included as a kit lens. Like an 18-200mm instead of the 18-55 which is useless and ajust the price accordingly.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Ted Herrera
Reviews.Content: The camera was shipped quickly and arrived in perfect condition. The camera is awesome, and with the package, it has everything you need to get started. Very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: CATALINA OTERO
Reviews.Content: Great camera,easy to use, easy to learn how to use it more professionally, good size, good pictures. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Hawley
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, great entry level DSLR product was exactl;y what was said it would be and is everything things that I was looking for in a camera

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: jeremy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife and it is a great buy my wife enjoys it and it is very easy to use

Reviews.Title: Awesome Bumdle
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Im starting to learn about photography, so this is a great camera to start with and the boundle has all the basic stuff accesories to take good care of your kit.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Mariana
Reviews.Content: Everything perfect!. La camara es increible y supera mis expectativas! Excelente vendedor y perfecta transaccion. Muy recomendado para comprar este tipo de equipos

Reviews.Title: Thanks for the camera but i didnt get a receipt and also the bag i received is oversized. It doesnt fit the camera that i bought
Reviews.Author: Asaf
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the camera but i didnt get a receipt.Also the bag i received is oversized, it doesnt fit the camera that i bought.Please advise.Asaf Onnasafonn@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: This package is a good deal
Reviews.Author: N. Bliss "Nome"
Reviews.Content: This "kit" or package included everything needed to get started.  It was purchased as a gift and very well received.  Takes beautiful pictures!

Reviews.Title: GREAT KIT!
Reviews.Author: kristy156
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect kit for beginners and gives you everything that you need to get started. I would suggest the next model up. It also comes in its own bundle but you get more for the price and more features!http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004ZL9ZPG/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B004ZL9ZPG&linkCode;=as2&tag;=wwwworkoutwei-20

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: OSCAR1
Reviews.Content: takes great pictures. took it  to Ireland, had fantastic pictures of everything I could. Could not ask for anything better.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: tony skiles
Reviews.Content: very very nice, does more than he normal person would ever use, but the pictures are amazing.. very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Good Package, Fantastic Value
Reviews.Author: Anthony Constantino
Reviews.Content: The Nikon D3100 is a perfect entry level DSLR for anyone who is interested in becoming involved with photography. I've recently picked it up as a hobby, and the D3100 has proven to be the perfect tool. The image quality is fantastic, and the leaning curve is fast and fun to figure out. It comes with a very decent lens with vibration reduction and auto focus features. The accessories that the camera comes with are a good complement; the case is lightweight but durable, you won't need to go out and buy an SD card, and when it comes time to clean the camera, you'll have all the tools necessary. The only things that came with the package that I was not happy with were the flimsy USB SD card reader which broke on first use and the cut-it-yourself screen protectors that have more scratches on them after you get it on than your bare screen will ever have. All in all, a great buy and a fantastic value for all of the accessories it comes with. I would highly recommend to anyone thinking about picking up photography -- this will be a great start!

Reviews.Title: Close-ups suck
Reviews.Author: Olivia Russell
Reviews.Content: Maybe it's because I'm new to this camera. Everything works great, I'm still learning all the features, but if something is too close to the lens, the camera won't take the picture, so beware of that.  Also there are times when the object isn't a close-up but it still won't take. Again, I'm still looking into why it does this. Also, unless your light is like, super excellent, broad daylight, it's always going to tell you poor lighting. Doesn't mean it won't take the picture, but the flash is going to pop up regardless.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: mb402ll/a
Reviews.Content: Brand new product with out any cosmetic crash , good packing , quick shipment and  work properly I will recommend 100 %

Reviews.Title: cheap place to buy!
Reviews.Author: Peter Konicek "Peter Konicek"
Reviews.Content: Bough this product a while back and so far no problems. With no problems,  I'm happy with this purchase because I saved money compared to buying it anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and worth the price!
Reviews.Author: LMG
Reviews.Content: Great product. Received a great price for the bundle. Camera is easy to use and the 16GB card comes in handy with taking tons of photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: photofran
Reviews.Content: My first DSLR.  So far so good!  Takes much better pictures than I am capable of taking.  Functions are easy to learn and in general the camera is very easy to operate.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great entry level DSLR.

Reviews.Title: great package
Reviews.Author: chevyburb
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera package for the beginner this was my first dslr camera and the accessories that came with this package make it easy to start shooting right away.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3100 Camera
Reviews.Author: Colmaran
Reviews.Content: After reading online and trying out the Nikon D3100, I decided this should be my first SLR camera. I find it easy to use and with the Accessory Kit I purchased along with it a true find!  My next addition? A telescope lens!

Reviews.Title: Ok!
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my new camera! It's amaizing, there's no cons with it!!Now I'm playing with it and learning how to take the best pictures!!

Reviews.Title: lens protector
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: The lens protector is  very good for stopping scratching, and keeps it from smudging.  Keeps camera like new. I highly recommend this product to anybody buying a new camera.This is for a Nikon D3100.

Reviews.Title: Awesome kit!
Reviews.Author: VizFact ! "VizFact Dot Com"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this kit, it came with everything, and the extra 4 gig memory card in the camera bag was a nice touch.I love you people. thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Trainpops
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife as a birthday gift. She surprised me with a Nikon D60 a few years ago, and I am not sure which of us has enjoyed that purchase more. My wife has become quite the advanced amateur photographer since the D60 purchase and I wnated her to have something similar that she could call her own. Both of us are thrilled with the D3100. I love my D60 and Nikon has really taken it up a few notches for the D3100. The controls are even easier to use, viewfinder seems brighter to me, lcd display is brighter and better organized, photos are spectacular. Everything I was hoping for. The package that Cameta Camera provided is a great starter package at an excellent price. Shipping was fast, and everything arrived ready to go. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase at a great price
Reviews.Author: Joseph C. Feest
Reviews.Content: This was my first foray into a digital SLR and everything I read about this camera made me think this should be the camera I would purchase when I left the point and shoot camera realm.  My goal was to get a camera that was easy to use and I found it!  After seeking advice from a friend who said the camera package was a great deal, I jumped at the opportunity and now am the very satisfied owner of a Nikon D3100 SLR with accessories.  The seller delivered in a timely manner and provided an amazing product.  I would highly recommend this purchase to anyone else who is looking for their first digital SLR.

Reviews.Title: Very Good!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: very nice kit! Amazon delivered the product very quickly. Camera picture quality is awesome. Video quality also good though I have expected more for 1080p which is mentioned in specs. This is my 1st DSLR camera and i like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Good buy .. worth for the money..
Reviews.Author: Abhi
Reviews.Content: the cam is really good product and a nice entry level SLR .. but once u get familiar u wud want to buy a 70-300 mm lens .. so its better to buy two lenses as a bundles .. worth it ..

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera package for my husband for Christmas.  Obviously my motives were questionable!  Love this camera.  Have had other Nikon products in the past and once again Nikon does not disappoint!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money!
Reviews.Author: akloster1
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera for over a year now and I still love it! I take hundreds of pictures every day and it holds up to the abuse. The carrying case is great, the SD card holds tons of pictures, the lens with filter are good, and the battery lasts quite a while. The camera its self is wonderful! I had an error message after using it for about 6 months and Nikon repaired it and sent it back for free. They even thoroughly cleaned it for me so it was like new again!Nikon is a great camera. I'm happy I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Tony J Smith
Reviews.Content: I wanted a more advanced camera so that I could do more with it than my "point and shoot" Nikon.  I still like it but this one has SO MUCH MORE to it!  I love it!  The extras that I got with it are OK but not really necessary.  The camera does NOT come with a memory card so it was nice that the extras had that but you could also buy it separately.  I tried the screen protector and either didn't get it cut quite right or something and it came off within a couple of days.  I might try a different kind.  I like having the filter that came with the "extras" (but you could get that separately, too).  I personally don't need the card reader but it's probably good to have it in case my computer's card reader stops working. The case is nice.  I've also ordered a telephoto zoom lens for it as the lens it comes with doesn't zoom as far as I want it to (like my point and shoot does) and I want to be able to take as good of quality photos zoomed in as I do with the regular lens.  This is a very good DSLR and I can't wait to learn more about it and play with it.  I did print out the Reference Manual at a copy place and had it bound so I have all the details on paper.  I also have it on my computer so I can access it via PDF if I want to.  I suggest also buying a 55-300 zoom lens for it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Willis
Reviews.Content: You can not beat this camera. Really great. I'm a photographer (with no money) and this works great for me.I'm pro and do not need anything else. No problems. Would buy another one if I had the money.The case is not the best but it is free. I just got a pro case. Great Great!!!You can not go wrong with Nikon. I had 3 canons and they all broke. Junk canon!They very expensive cameras too. Around $400. Buy Nikon. canon is a Joke.Buy Buy Buy!!!

Reviews.Title: No Complaints...
Reviews.Author: Delly
Reviews.Content: The package was delivered on time and all the described contents were included (including the [neck] strap). I'm particularly impressed with the case tho - Nikon branded and has enough padding to protect the camera in my estimation. Now to get to shooting...photo shoots, of course!! ;)Oh, P.s. I wish I could figure out how to position the partitions in the case to have everything packed as nicely as in the display pic!! lol

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: anaweza
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the camera very much.  It is easy to use for a novice and the pictures are great.  The seller was very expedient in getting my items to me and very helpful.  I would definitely use them again.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: it is my first dslr camera, the stuff that it came with was great, great camera. definitely a buyer, i recommend it to beginners

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo Grandon
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent.Just a little dissapointed to find out that it was no wireless remote functionality like the D3000 or D5000.A bit silly not to include it... maybe they just want you to buy the new D95...Anyway... my fault

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera-outdoor video weak in use
Reviews.Author: William J. Boyle "thebehaviorist"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome intro DSLR.  As for pictures, you can't get much better.  I do miss a few features I had on the G11 that I wished would carry over to DSLRs.  One, the viewfinder does not work for video.  When doing a lot of outdoor work in the mountains, video on the view screen is close to impossible tiosee especially if you must track something moving.  Two, I miss having live view of picture when inA,S,P and M modes.  Not that it is accurate but it is a fast way to assess lighting and how a picture might turn out--especially if you use the camera a lot during sunrise and sunset.  G

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 8 PRODUCTS -- All Brand New Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<#1> Nikon D3100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens PLUS +
<#2> Transcend 16GB High-Capacity SecureDigital (SDHC) Card + <#3> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<#4> Nikon Compact Digital SLR System Case + <#5> Precision Design USB 2.0 High Speed SecureDigital (SD/SDHC) Card Reader +
<#6> Precision Design Memory Card Storage Wallet + <#7> Precision Design Deluxe 6 Piece Lens & Digital SLR Cleaning Kit + <#8> Digital Camera LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm VR Lens with 16GB Card + Filter + Case + Accessory Kit
